text: Mā anussavena mā paramparāya mā itikirāya mā piṭakasampadānena mā takkahetu mā nayahetu mā ākāraparivitakkena mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā mā bhabbarūpatāya mā samaṇo no garūti
edit: Mā anussavena mā paramparāya mā itikirāya mā piṭakasampadānena mā takkahetu mā nayahetu mā ākāraparivitakkena mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā mā bhabbarūpatāya mā samaṇo no garūti

translations.transtext: Do not [take merely] by hearsay. Do not [take merely] by traditional practice. Do not [take merely] by hearing thus. Do not [take merely] by referring to text. Do not [take merely] by thinking. Do not [take merely] by inference. Do not [take merely] by appearance consideration. Do not [take merely] by agreement with our view. Do not [take merely] by appearance of likelihood. Do not [take merely] by [seeing this] ascetic as [our] teacher.
